item.description: Hi! I’m Hao Zhu, a Data Scientist and Software Developer at Marcus Institute for Aging Research. I make tools that are easy to use and hopefully helpful for the scientific community. As a user, I hate to use tools that either have no vignette at all or have a 500 page manual. I like software that don’t give me too many but some choices. I hate to see ugly plots. I like everything that can be turned into dynamic.
You can find me on twitter @haozhu233 or contact me through email, which can be found on this page in the maintainer field.
R kableExtra: One of the most popular package to make beautiful tables in R memor: Customizable R Markdown LaTeX Template giphyr: RStudio Addin to download GIF from giphy.com and insert to rmarkdown
